column4: debconf: DbDriver "config": /var/cache/debconf/config.dat is locked by another proces
how can I unlock that file? My PC died during the last dist-upgrade?
you have a running process that blocking access
use top to see whats running then kill it will killall -9 appname  most common problem is that dpkg-reconfigur is running so type sudo killall -9 dpkg-reconfigur
